summary: Bug fix verification for Plantillas de Recomendaciones. The 'body stream already read' error in handlePlantillaSubmit was fixed by the main agent. Backend tests: 20/20 passed. Frontend E2E tests: 17/17 passed (16 + 1 verification test). All CRUD operations, mass application, and template usage features working correctly.
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created. Existing 8 default plantillas used for testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Plantillas de Recomendaciones functionality verified working. The bug fix for 'body stream already read' error in handlePlantillaSubmit was successful. Features tested: GET/POST/PUT/DELETE plantillas, toggle activo, aplicaci√≥n masiva, seed default templates, statistics, use template in recommendation form. Login helper updated to be more resilient.
rca_of_issue: Bug was fixed by main agent. Original issue: handlePlantillaSubmit was calling response.json() before checking response.ok, which caused double-reading of the response body stream. Fix: Check response.ok first, then read JSON only once for success case.
